definition: to receive/to answer (the phone)/to meet or welcome sb/to connect/to catch/to join/to extend/to take one's turn on duty/to take over for sb
to receive/to accept/to collect/to put away/to restrain/to stop/in care of (used on address line after name)

pinyin: jie1 shou1 qi4 ling2 min3 du4

sentences.english: The television receiver is an electronic device .
sentences.chinese: 电视接收器是一种电子装置。

sentences.english: Trackside monitoring equipment would feed information to a receiver on the train.
sentences.chinese: 轨道旁监控设备会向列车上的接收器反馈信息。

sentences.english: An audio receiver amplifies the sound of the blood moving though the vessel.
sentences.chinese: 有一个音频接收器放大血流通过血管的声音。

sentences.english: A receiver demodulates the carrier signal that arrives from its antenna.
sentences.chinese: 接收器解调变到达它的天线的载波讯号。

sentences.english: The receiver was placed several meters from the other device.
sentences.chinese: 这个接收器被放置在那个放电装置的数米之外。

sentences.english: The receiver estimates the impulse response characteristic of each subchannel as a whole.
sentences.chinese: 该接收器评估每一子通道的脉冲响应特性为一体。

sentences.english: Run the batch file again and check the trap receiver.
sentences.chinese: 再次运行批处理文件并检查陷阱接收器。

sentences.english: The problem with this was that in the past the recievers were much too heavy for climbers to carry.
sentences.chinese: 问题是过去，接收器都太重了以至于爬山者无法搬动。

sentences.english: Auto-tuning VHF receivers are now common in cars.
sentences.chinese: 自动调节甚高频接收器现在普遍应用于汽车。

sentences.english: But they do have shortwave receivers.
sentences.chinese: 但是他们有短波接收器。

sentences.english: Experimented by dialing patterns on a phone receiver.
sentences.chinese: 借由打一个电话接收器拨式样实验。

sentences.english: In the paper, the various types of ion current collectors of Mass spectrometer were described.
sentences.chinese: 本文讨论了质谱计上的离子流接收器。

sentences.english: It is matched by a receiver using the same algorithm.
sentences.chinese: 它由一个使用相同的算法的接收器匹配。

sentences.english: The third type of concentrator system is a central receiver.
sentences.chinese: 集中器系统的第三种类型是一台中央接收器。

sentences.english: Receiver is a key module in high-speed serial link.
sentences.chinese: 接收器电路是高速串行接口电路中关键模块。

sentences.english: This telephone was made of wood and was simultaneously used as a microphone and a receiver.
sentences.chinese: 这部电话机为木质材质，同时用作话筒和接收器。

pinyin: wu2 xian4 dian4 jie1 shou1 ji1
